column1: Table 5-6:  CH4 and N2O Emissions from Manure Management (MMT CO2 Eq.)

column2: + Does not exceed 0.05 MMT CO2 Eq.
a Accounts for CH4 reductions due to capture and destruction of CH4 at facilities using anaerobic digesters.
b Includes both direct and indirect N2O emissions.
c There are no American bison N2O emissions from managed systems; American bison are maintained entirely on pasture, range, and paddock.
Notes: Emissions from manure deposited on pasture are included in the Agricultural Soils Management sector. Totals may not sum due to independent rounding.
